snippet.title: ⚔️💀 Skeleton Crew — Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Modern Wolf presents Skeleton Crew,  a gothic platformer with a pinball-like twist coming soon.

Wishlist Skeleton Crew on Steam: store.steampowered.com/app/1145330/Skeleton_Crew/


Kick, throw and thrash your way to victory in this gothic multiplayer platform brawler. Explore dungeons, unlock new characters, kick butts 🍑
Launch your friends around the map to reach secret areas and solve fiendish puzzles in up to 4-player co-op. 

Check out our publisher store here 🐺👇
store.steampowered.com/publisher/ModernWolf

Follow Modern Wolf on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModernWolfLtd
Follow Cinder Cone on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CinderConeGames
